data.text:
RT @wmgrewards: Take a trip to Cracker Island! Win two tickets to see @Gorillaz live on tour✨
https://t.co/ptHIGzvi6C https://t.co/lwaB0Imz…
💜💜💜 https://t.co/hAiRuzgs5f
The Scholar looked up from her books and gazed upon her fellow Elders. She began to wonder if this cult thing might already be going a bit sideways… https://t.co/MQGfGVtthO
Russel, The Truth Seeker, welcomed the great spire – as an antenna to boost his tv reception. For hidden somewhere in the static were the keys to the promised land. https://t.co/HTTa8qzSi5
And so, The Chosen One was chosen to paint the obelisk bright pink. Six coats. That ought to do it. https://t.co/Nv5Nf0k4lG
Unfortunately for Murdoc, the lady next door didn’t seem to have noticed, which annoyed him greatly as it cost several thousand dollars on Etsy. https://t.co/E5kpzGTTly
As the seed of the Last Cult took root, a mighty obelisk sprouted over the Silver Lake to proclaim the power of The Great Leader. https://t.co/KKNMJFFgLS

🚨 ATTN NORTH AMERICA 🚨 
Tour starts THIS WEEKEND ⌛️

urls.title: Vodka Murdini Cocktail Recipe | The Bar
urls.description: Murdoc Niccals is affectionally regarded by the Gorillaz fandom community as Pickle (ode to his green skin) and we wouldn’t put it past him to consider himself the ideal candidate for the next Bond, so it was a no brainer to take the shaken, not stirred classic and whack a pickle in it.. Hold the olive.

tweets.text:
M Niccals (me) and @Smirnoffeurope request your presence at my LIVE COCKTAIL MASTERCLASS this Thursday!! Learn from the master (also me) as I expertly mix my signature Vodka Murdini live on air. Wanna follow along at home? Here's what you'll need: https://t.co/VJCP1QcAC6
 #18

urls.title: Webplex - MTV EMA INTL - Hybrid Homepage
urls.description: The 2022 MTV Europe Music Awards celebrate the best music of the year and the biggest artists from around the world. The show will air live on MTV from PSD Bank Dome on November 13!

tweets.text: Just heard that voting ends TONIGHT for the MTV EMAs – suppose I better figure out who to thank in my speech if Gorillaz win. His Majesty the King, for starters. Then thanks to the fans for voting. But mostly, thanks to me for creating Gorillaz. https://t.co/WRIz6hTsx3 https://t.co/lomdVXPVR0

urls.title: Demon Days — Gorillaz | Last.fm
urls.description: Listen free to Gorillaz – Demon Days (Intro, Last Living Souls and more). 15 tracks (). "Demon Days" is the second studio album and a concept album by Gorillaz, released on 23 May 2005 in the United Kingdom and on 24 May in the United States. The album features contributions from De La Soul, Neneh Cherry, Martina Topley-Bird, Roots Manuva, MF DOOM, Ike Turner, Bootie Brown of the Pharcyde, Shaun Ryder, Dennis Hopper, the London Community Gospel Choir and the San Fernando Valley Youth Chorus. "Demon Days" entered the UK charts at #1 and the U.S. charts at #6, outperforming the band's 2001 debut, Gorillaz. The album had sold over six million copies as of 2006. The album features the singles "Feel Good Inc.",… Discover more music, concerts, videos, and pictures with the largest catalogue online at Last.fm.

tweets.text:
Praise be to me! I am honoured, humbled but not remotely surprised that Gorillaz have been nominated at the MTV Europe Music Awards! Vote for us as Best Alternative Artist and your sins shall be cleansed. Cheers.
https://t.co/2FLVzRoQuW

To all my disciples attending our shows in Los Angeles this weekend, if any of you can get a group chant going of ‘PRAISE BE TO MURDOC’, I will grant you eternal salvation (and maybe even some signed merch?). See you there!

As announced by Chris Moyles on The Breakfast Show this morning, our Record Of The Week is New Gold by @gorillaz Feat. Tame Impala & Bootie Brown. This is the second single from their 8th studio album, Cracker Island, which is set for release early next year! 🔥 https://t.co/UH0uKEgdEc

urls.title: Gorillaz tap Stevie Nicks, Bad Bunny, Tame Impala, and more for new 'Cracker Island' album
urls.description: Gorillaz announced the release of their eighth studio album as it’s jam-packed with superstar collaborators. Titled ‘Cracker Island’, the record will feature appearances from Stevie Nicks, Bad Bunny, and more.
